metadata.headquarters: Madison Insurance House, Upper Hill Close, P.O. Box 41163-00100, Nairobi, Kenya

digital_presence.api_notes: USSD *828# for quotes and purchases; online portal for policy management

reputation.claims_settlement_ratio: Consistent performance; paid Ksh 134M flood claim in 2025 (Sinohydro case); sector-wide claims rose to Ksh 294.9B in H1 2025
reputation.customer_complaints: Limited public details; some delays in claims noted on X; positive for affordability and education products
reputation.customer_rating: Positive feedback for flexible products and customer service; trusted for 30+ years
reputation.notes: Locally owned since 1988; 27 branches; ranked in top 10 insurers for 2025 (Bowman); focuses on education and health innovation

eligibility.notes: For goods in transit by sea/air; based on invoice value

premium.rate_table_notes: Rates vary by cargo type, route; includes duty/VAT loading

text: {"company_name": "Madison Group Limited", "product_id": "madison_marine_001", "product_name": "Marine Insurance", "category": "general / non-life insurance / marine", "target_market": "importers, exporters, logistics firms", "eligibility": {"notes": "For goods in transit by sea/air; based on invoice value"}, "geographic_coverage": "Kenya / international (port-to-port)", "premium": {"currency": "KES", "payment_frequency": ["per-shipment", "annual open cover"], "rate_table": [{"cargo_type": "General cargo", "sum_insured": 10000000, "premium_rate": "0.5% of sum insured", "notes": "FOB/CIF basis + 10-20% incidentals"}], "rate_table_notes": "Rates vary by cargo type, route; includes duty/VAT loading", "sample_examples": [{"example": "KES 50,000 for KES 10M general cargo (0.5%)."}]}, "coverage": {"benefits": ["Loss/damage to goods in transit", "General average contributions", "Salvage charges", "Warehouse-to-warehouse extension"], "duration": "per-shipment or annual"}, "exclusions": ["Inherent vice, improper packing", "War risks (add-on available)"], "add_ons": ["War and strikes"], "provider_network": {"partners": "Marine surveyors, port authorities"}, "claims_process": {"required_documents": ["Bill of lading", "Invoice", "Surveyor report"], "average_turnaround_days": 30, "digital_claims_supported": false}, "renewal_terms": {"auto_renewal": false, "grace_period_days": null}, "distribution_channels": ["brokers", "direct"], "customer_reviews": [], "last_updated": "2025-09-21", "sources": [{"title": "Madison Marine Insurance Page", "url": "https://www.madison.co.ke/protect-your-business/marine-insurance/"}]}

benefits: Building/contents vs fire, theft, burglary, natural perils
